text: Allah tanatu (ella) atiyarkalukku(m kututal kuraivinri) porulai virittu(k kotuttu) vittal, avarkal pumiyil aniyayam ceyyat talaippattu vituvarkal. Akave, (avarkalin takutikkut takkavaru)tan virumpiya alave (avarkalukkuk) kotuttu varukiran. Niccayamaka avan tan atiyarkalin tanmaiyai nankarintavanum, (avarkalutaiya ceyalai) urru nokkupavanum avan
